Thank you for your continued support for Terraria!

Thank you for your continued support for Terraria!

Happy Valentine’s Terraria Fans

- Find a Broken Heart Crystal to summon Cupid!

- Captivate your enemies with stunning Heart Arrows

- Give your sweetheart a special boost by giving them a - - Valentine Ring -- available from vendors for a limited time!

- Additional Bug Fixes

Thank you for your continued support of Terraria.

New on this build Bug Fixes and optimizations including:

- Minimap sometimes could take a long time to open
- Unable to view ingredients on items on the bottom of the screen in the crafting tab.

Thank you for your feedback!

Thank you for your continued support of Terraria 

New on this build Bug Fixes and optimizations including:

- Minimap sometimes could take a long time to open
- Unable to view ingredients on items on the bottom of the screen in the crafting tab.

Thank you for your feedback!

"**This update is optimized for iOS 6.1 and above**

(Requires iPod touch 5th gen, iPhone 4, or iPad 2 or better)

HARDMODE HAS ARRIVED! Our biggest update to date!  


Defeat the Wall of Flesh to transform your world!

 - New biomes

 - New bosses

 - 20+ new enemies

 - 100+ new items

 - New NPCs

 - Use the Pwnhammer to destroy Demon Altars and create new ores



Also new: combat targeting!

 - Touch an enemy to target it and you will aim toward it by default

 - Very helpful for ranged weapons!



Finally: we've added Everyplay support!

 - Record and share your gameplay via the Pause Menu

 - Watch other players' adventures via the Videos button in the Main Menu



Thank you for your continued support of Terraria!"

"**This update is optimized for iOS 6.1 and above**

Also new: combat targeting!

Finally: we've added Everyplay support!

Thank you for your continued support of Terraria!"

Thank you for your continued support of Terraria, on this update:

● We are temporarily removing Everyplay due to a major issue that causes instability in the game.  We are working hard to fix this and will update with Everyplay enabled once we have completed the fix.
● Expanded language support
● Made Ocram slightly more difficult
● Fixed bug where Ocram didn’t spawn enough minions
● Fixed glitch where you could ignore Ocram's damage by using the spike blocks
● Ocram gained a bit more health
● Fixed tinker workshop glitch
● Fixed Clockwork Assault Rifle not working as intended
● Added boss music
● Added snow biome music
● Fixed issue where underground music would not play
● Tweaked various loot tables
● Overall a bit less loot and sometimes lower spawn chance
● Tweaked the drop rate of soul of night / light
● Fixed rainbow rod not having a projectile

The Oktoberfest festival is here! The merchant has made some of his famous brew and the clothier is selling traditional festival clothes.

Minor bug fixes.

Thank you for supporting Terraria

Urgent bug fixes

The Oktoberfest festival is here! The merchant has made some of his famous brew and the clothier is selling traditional festival clothes.

Thanksgiving is here!

If you search well, you might find yourself a new little friend! But beware not to stuff his face too much... once he turns up his nose, there is no going back.

- Turkey feather, spawns Turkey pet, is sold by vendor

- Cursed stuffing, is dropped by enemies, turns Turkey pet into Turkor

- Turkor, who when slain drops the Horn of Plenty. This is a regular healing potion which never depletes.

Fixes

- Water Candle now works even if you're not holding it. 

- Now holding the buy button will keep on buying until you let go of the screen. (Same
 as crafting)

- Wraith AI had a bug where he could get stuck flying on a certain height

Thanksgiving is here!

If you search well, you might find yourself a new little friend! But beware not to stuff his face too much... once he turns up his nose, there is no going back.

- Turkey feather, spawns Turkey pet, is sold by vendor

- Cursed stuffing, is dropped by enemies, turns Turkey pet into Turkor

- Turkor, who when slain drops the Horn of Plenty. This is a regular healing potion which never depletes.

Fixes

- Water Candle now works even if you're not holding it. 

- Now holding the buy button will keep on buying until you let go of the screen. (Same
 as crafting)

- Wraith AI had a bug where he could get stuck flying on a certain height

Terrarians, we apologize for the issues some of you have been experiencing.  

- This build addresses issues with loading and entering the game that some users were experiencing.

We also fixed the following issues:
- No longer able to craft any item regardless if you are near the crafting station or not.
- Crimson biome enemies now correctly drop souls.
- Another fix for enemy spawn issue's.
- Fixed issue where ingredients where being shown too large on phones
- Fixed bug where certain enemies would never spawn.

Terrarians, we apologize for the issues some of you have been experiencing.  

- This build addresses issues with loading and entering the game that some users were experiencing.

We also fixed the following issues:
- No longer able to craft any item regardless if you are near the crafting station or not.
- Crimson biome enemies now correctly drop souls.
- Another fix for enemy spawn issue's.
- Fixed issue where ingredients where being shown too large on phones
- Fixed bug where certain enemies would never spawn.

Terrarians, we apologize for the issues affecting some of our players with the latest update.
 
This build fixes critical issues where characters and worlds would not load and/or crash.  In order to help you make up for lost time players will receive a gift to compensate for potential data loss.

In addition, we have the following bug fixes:

- Fixed bug where ingredients were rendered to large
- Fixed issue where certain enemies would never spawn
- Fixed issue where NPC spawning window was too big This should make the spawn behavior a lot better.
- Fixed issue where hearts were incorrectly rendered on some devices
- Fixed issue where crimson mobs never would drop the soul of night

Terrarians, we apologize for the issues affecting some of our players with the latest update.
 
This build fixes critical issues where characters and worlds would not load and/or crash.  In order to help you make up for lost time players will receive a gift to compensate for potential data loss.

In addition, we have the following bug fixes:

- Fixed bug where ingredients were rendered to large
- Fixed issue where certain enemies would never spawn
- Fixed issue where NPC spawning window was too big This should make the spawn behavior a lot better.
- Fixed issue where hearts were incorrectly rendered on some devices
- Fixed issue where crimson mobs never would drop the soul of night

Thank you for your continued support of Terraria!

This updated focuses on fixes:
- The game now auto saves every 2 minutes
- Pearlstone brick no longer spreads hallow
- Fixed bug where items equipped by client players were not synced correctly
- Fixed bug where crafting ingredients where visible after leaving the crafting tab
- Fixed stutter when cloud saving 
- Lihzard door can no longer be destroyed by explosives
- Fixed issues with painting
Many other additional fixes, improvements and optimizations

- Minor multiplayer fixes

Terrarians Duke Fishron arrives on Terraria Mobile along with the huge 1.2.3 and 1.2.4 content updates. 
In this update we have tons of new content including:
▪ Duke Fishron
▪ Frost Moon
▪ Fishing
▪ Mine carts
▪ Mounts and more!

Terrarians Duke Fishron arrives on Terraria Mobile along with the huge 1.2.3 and 1.2.4 content updates. 
In this update we have tons of new content including:
▪ Duke Fishron
▪ Frost Moon
▪ Fishing
▪ Mine carts
▪ Mounts and more!

Terrarians, thank you for your continued support.

- This build includes critical fixes for Cloud access on iOS 7 devices.  You will be able to access your cloud characters and cloud worlds.  However due to all the additional content in 1.2.4 world save files will have to be converted to local saves.  This only applies to iOS7, iOS8+ users will be able to continue to save their worlds to the Cloud.
- If you are using iOS8 or above please ensure that iCloud Drive is enabled in order to access Cloud saves.  To do this go to Settings > iCloud > iCloud Drive and toggle it on.  You should see your saves shortly after.
- Many gameplay fixes and improvements.

Terrarians, thank you for your continued support.

- This build includes critical fixes for Cloud access on iOS 7 devices.  You will be able to access your cloud characters and cloud worlds.  However due to all the additional content in 1.2.4 world save files will have to be converted to local saves.  This only applies to iOS7, iOS8+ users will be able to continue to save their worlds to the Cloud.
- If you are using iOS8 or above please ensure that iCloud Drive is enabled in order to access Cloud saves.  To do this go to Settings > iCloud > iCloud Drive and toggle it on.  You should see your saves shortly after.
- Many gameplay fixes and improvements.

Terrarians, thank you for your patience and continued support.

This update includes lots of gameplay fixes, please visit the Terraria forums for full details http://forums.terraria.org/index.php?threads/mobile-fixes-update-and-changelog.40149/

Terrarians, thank you for your patience and continued support.

This update includes lots of gameplay fixes, please visit the Terraria forums for full details http://forums.terraria.org/index.php?threads/mobile-fixes-update-and-changelog.40149/

Dig! Fight! and Explore in a more expansive world over 2.5 times the size of what has been available thus far for Mobile Terrarians!  The Easter Bunny has left everyone a basket brimming with goodies - from needed fixes to the long-standing player request for more room to explore, this update is literally bursting at the seams with the inclusion of Expanded Worlds!

IMPORTANT NOTES:

Unfortunately, one side effect of this update is that it will bring down the curtain on iOS 7 support.  Older devices that are not capable of iOS 8+ are just not capable of running what we have planned in a way that is acceptable.  We remain fully committed to supporting iOS 8 and above from here on in.

If you have an iPhone 4S or an iPad 2nd Gen, which both have less than 1GB of memory, you may experience performance issues if you create an Expanded World.

That's right, you will now have the option of creating a more expansive world consisting of 4200 x 1200 tiles (equivalent to "Small" worlds on PC) OR a Normal World (1750 x 1000 tiles)!  Expanded worlds will also sort out some of the "interesting" worldgen quirks that existed on mobile to-date due to "overcrowding" of biomes. Way cooler than a chocolate bunny or stale marshmallow chicks!

This update also includes a second round of bug fixes from the ongoing list (thanks again for all of those informative bug reports - keep them coming!), with more to come! 

This update includes lots of gameplay fixes, please visit the Terraria forums for full details http://forums.terraria.org/index.php?threads/terraria-mobile-update-expanded-worlds-more.41313/

Terrarians, thank you for your continued support. This build includes a critical fix that has resolved the Firefly related crashes as seen in 1.2.11964.

Greetings Terrarians! Thank you as always for your ongoing and enthusiastic support.  We are excited to bring you the latest in our string of updates focused on solidifying the core game experience.

This update includes additional Local and Cloud save slots for Characters and Worlds as well as the functionality to back-up your saves! 

It also includes lots of gameplay fixes, please visit the Terraria forums for full details: http://forums.terraria.org/index.php?threads/expanded-save-slots-backup-function-is-here-for-ios-and-google-play.44852/

Greetings Terrarians! Thank you as always for your ongoing and enthusiastic support.  We are excited to bring you the latest in our string of updates focused on solidifying the core game experience.

This update includes additional Local and Cloud save slots for Characters and Worlds as well as the functionality to back-up your saves! 

It also includes lots of gameplay fixes, please visit the Terraria forums for full details: http://forums.terraria.org/index.php?threads/expanded-save-slots-backup-function-is-here-for-ios-and-google-play.44852/

Greetings Terrarians! This hot fix update includes improvements to the back-up functionality and fixes for known crash issues in the crafting menu. 

This update also includes a bunch of gameplay fixes. Please visit the Terraria forums for full details: http://forums.terraria.org/index.php?threads/expanded-save-slots-backup-function-is-here-for-ios-and-google-play.44852/
